channel.title: Perl Weekly #603
channel.description: Hand-picked news and articles about Perl - Made with love by TabHub(https://tabhub.github.io)

item.title: Project Report "Google TensorFlow API Bindings for Perl"
item.description: The project has been submitted for final review. The delivered deliverables are in the article as outlined by John Napiorkowski.
item.author: saif_ahmed

item.title: Bug fix and maintenance release 1.62 of perl-workflow
item.description: I can only applaud the extra mile Jonas goes publishing about his releases on DEV.to too.
item.author: jonas_nielsen

item.title: The Perl Toolchain Summit 2023 has a COVID Policy
item.description: The single most important step in protecting others is to not show up sick.
item.author: philippe_bruhat

item.title: First release of SPVM::File::Copy and SPVM::FindBin
item.description: It is really nice that Yuki sticks to his project(s) so much and even keeps blogging about them. Where are the followers?
item.author: yuki_kimoto

item.title: Find expiring SSL certs using curl, Go and Perl.
item.description: Just like domain name registrations, SSL certificates need to be renewed regularly, otherwise they expire. This means you now have one more thing to monitor. Let's look at ways to do this in Perl, curl and Go. The article also gives a quick introduction to a hosted Mojolicious app that Olaf wrote to make this even easier.
item.author: olaf_alders

item.title: NICEPERL's lists
item.description:
Great CPAN modules released last week;
MetaCPAN weekly report;
StackOverflow Perl report.
item.author: miguel_prz
